Body: Description: We recently made a change on one of the Group by enabling  ( Advance Printing and MTP scanning )  so that if any user try to print any sensitive information , than it should triggered an alert on EPP console . This Group which includes  VDIs only and after  enabling that setting ,  we have experienced extreme  slowness on all  VDIs ( both from Win 10 and Win 11 ) . We  turned off this setting and apparently the problem of slowness has been resolved .  We  want to ask from EPP support that if this printing setting was the cause of the problem .

What We've Learned Updated: the customer's Citrix VDI environment is seeing slowness when activating advanced printing and mtp scanning setting.
will ask for information or set up a meeting to gather logs.
Next Steps Updated: waiting on the customer to provide logs and information, or availability for gathering them in a meeting
Next Steps Updated: waiting on the customer to create a change request internally so we can test the exception list

What We've Learned Updated: during the remote session, we checked all Citrix services running on a terminal and created the MTP scanning exception app list.
the customer needs to raise an internal change request in order to enable the setting and as I proposed we should have the meeting right when the setting gets enabled so we can gather logs.
